api_list.name: Extract infos from the review or sentence
api_list.url: https://opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com/extract/The screen of the IPhone is awesome!

required_parameters.name: review
required_parameters.default: The screen of the IPhone is awesome!

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com/extract/The screen of the IPhone is awesome!"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com/extract/{review}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opinion-mining.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
